entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Async overloads of `Console.Write[Line]` #104182
  • [API Proposal]: Add `System.Threading.ConditionVariable` type #104179
  • GC Assert failure: committed_by_oh[oh] == compute_committed_bytes_per_heap (oh, committed_bookkeeping) #104178
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Csp.Tests failing on macOS x64 Debug #104172
  • [Apple] TvOS-arm64 failures on Serialization ExporterTypesTests #104162
  • [apple] TvOS-arm64 X509Certificates failures during AppleCrypto interop #104161
  • [API Proposal]: Add AuthenticationHeaderValue constructor accepting AuthenticationSchemes enum #104159
  • [cdacreader] Simplify build order and dependencies #104158
    Future
  • Arm64/Sve: Track if mask registers will be used and zero out if not #104157
    10.0.0
  • Unload_TwoCollectibleWithOneAssemblyAndOneInstanceReferencingAnother test failed in CI #104153
  • Compilation in Windows Container fails #104146
  • At least packages.microsoft.com has 8.0.7 version #104145
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters throws TypeInitializationException for WASM/Mobile #104142
    9.0.0
  • Add bucket size hints to histograms #104137
  • msbuild can not generate Publish.html file #104135

Closed

  • Unhandled exception. System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: No such host is known. (https:80) #102710
  • [Performance] Regression in multiple scenarios, Linux, more significant on ARM64 #102832
    9.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\eventsourceerror\\eventsourceerror\\eventsourceerror.cmd #81241
    Future
  • MemoryCache creates lots of tasks that cause CPU/Memory spikes on compaction. #97736
    9.0.0
  • Test failure eventsourceerror.sh on macOS x64: NullReferenceException #73034
    Future
  • 2nd call to MemoryCache.Set() with the same key erases entry if cache is full #36039
    Future
  • System.Text.Json generated serialization code should follow performance best practices #104169
  • Documentation status of _AggressiveAttributeTrimming #88805
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize<TValue>(TValue, JsonSerializerOptions?) throws an undocument ArgumentException #104168
  • Arm64/Sve: Revisit scalable register save/restore in prolog/epilogue #103320
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #93927
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: EventKeywords Enum Is Missing 0x80 To Enable Activity ID's #92790
    Future
  • AV in GcInfoDecoder #103894
    9.0.0
  • Extend System.Guid with a new creation API for v7 #103658
    9.0.0
  • [Mono JIT] Extend Linux perf jitdump functionality #36774
    9.0.0
  • Fatal error!!!! #100264
  • [mono] Enable -Werror on all CI lanes #41357
    9.0.0
  • WCF service with DataContract and EnumValues not returning enum values in result #101594
  • [mono] Tracking: Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx` #60483
    Future
  • [mono] Tracking: Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx2` #60484
    Future
  • [mono] Tracking: Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.AvxVnni` #60485
    Future
  • [mono] AOT compiler fails when assembly files are named in other cultures #65484
    6.0.x
  • [crossgen2-composite gcstress] OSX x64 failures with "External disassembler is not available" #71931
    9.0.0
  • Composite ReadyToRun fails when RelativePath has a path component #79902
    9.0.0
  • [MONO][TEST] runtime-llvm pipeline is not working #81563
    9.0.0
  • Mono runtime fails to build cross-compilers for x86/x64 on arm/arm64 #82495
    9.0.0
  • Failure in System.Threading.RateLimiting.Test.ConcurrencyLimiterTests.DoesNotDeadlockCleaningUpCanceledRequestedLease_Post #91653
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Long Running Test: System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskPropertiesTests.TaskIDTest #91907
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] [Long Running Test] System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CESchedulerPairTests.TestCompletionTask #91434
    9.0.0
  • Confused about unobserved exception #91100
    9.0.0
  • Thread.abort obselete and blocking inner calls, no way to abort the blocking call #104147
  • Can we enable rebase & merge in this repo? #56305
    Future
  • AndroidStripILAfterAOT causing "InvalidProgramException: Invalid IL code in Xunit.Assert:True(bool)" #103782
    9.0.0
  • Go over trimming tests we disabled for AOT #101228
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WASM: breakpoints on property setter not hit #102012
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WASM build unable to find `python` in $PATH on CBL Mariner 2.0 with .NET 6 #98714
    9.0.0
  • Re-enable System.Resources.Extensions.BinaryFormat.Tests test project #103447
    9.0.0
  • [Android] PlatformNotSupported failures inside System.Net.Security.Tests #104010
  • System.Text.Json Deserializing Nested Recursive Strings Problem #104133
  • [browser][MT] Assertion interp.c:4259 #102251
    9.0.0
  • MetaDataGetDispenser export missing for PublishSingleFile=true, and --self-contained #103687
  • RegexGenerator generating code with error CS0165. #103942
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix superpmi collect failure for crossgen2 on linux x64. #104181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use new interceptor pattern #104180
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Optimize Vector128<long> multiplication for arm64 #104177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Centralize the folding logic for ConditionalSelect and ensure side effects aren't dropped #104175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Xml serializer test updates prep for reflection work #104173
    area-Serialization
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Poly fill Index and Range types #104170
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Get rid of fluent assertions in System.Resources.Extensions.BinaryFormat.Tests #104166
    area-System.Resources, binary-serialization
  • Obsolete X509Certificate{2} constructors and X509Certificate2Collection.Import #104165
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Remove uses of CLRJIT_AZ_KEY/clrjit_key1 from SPMI #104164
    needs-area-label
  • [draft] testing memory stats of FF in helix #104152
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, 9.0.0
  • increase the allocation threshold for tests that need to ensure that 2GB+ does not get pre-allocated #104151
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.ConditionalExtract* APIs #104150
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasm] Disallow not useful configuration combinations #104149
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Avoid scanning isinst checks when building whole program view #104148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Added `ReleaseCores` to `BuildEngine` usages that did not have it. #104141
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix coreclr test readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_de… #104140
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • prevent feeding too much data to schannel during renegotiation #104130
    area-System.Net.Security

Merged

  • Arm64/Sve: Enable Sve only if vector length is 128 #104174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Accelerate Vector128<long>::op_Multiply on x64 #103555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Avoid long busy-waiting between hijack retries. #103212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NRBF] change StartsWithPayloadHeader to accept a Span rather than array #103636
    new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • [tests] Use net8.0 for the project used to restore workload manifest nuget, instead of net6.0 #104067
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add NULL checks to GetClassWithPossibleAV #104128
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix #97736 in MemoryCache.cs with a lock around the TriggerOvercapacityC... method #103992
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Subtract prior entry size when adding entry to cache #103931
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement `ShiftLeftLogical`, `ShiftRightArithmetic`, `ShiftRightLogical` #104119
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add dotnet/designs link to docs README #104155
    area-Meta
  • Revert "Fix potential Debug.Assert in QuicListener" #104154
    area-System.Net
  • Arm64/SVE: Add support to handle predicate registers as callee-trash #104065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add non-public SetEntryAssembly() API to System.Reflection #103726
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.x
  • Fix definite assignment error in regex source gen for some lazy loops #104007
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix AV in GcInfoDecoder #103938
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix infinite loop in IGenericCacheEntry.CreateAndCache #104126
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite TagList for .NET 8+ #104132
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Adding support for Guid.CreateVersion7 #104124
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move protected member check in the class #104118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Capture first line of linker version only #104136
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bucket failing Xml trimming test apps #102449
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix the race condition issue of aot_module loading #103975
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Only build the most recent source generator when building from source #104139
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • re-enable BinaryFormatter tests, fixes #103447 #104104
    area-System.Resources
  • [Android] Fix SslStreamCertificateContext empty custom trust store exception #104016
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [release/6.0] Surface error when `emcc -version` failed. #103967
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.33
  • [wasi] Revert "Always allocate when computing temp path" #104109
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, os-browser
  • [wasm] Repair very old merge damage and update comments #104052
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add user_events to the GC event level caching logic #104079
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [x64][SysV] Classify empty structs for passing like padding #103799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid MakeGenericMethod in XmlSerializer #102482
    area-Serialization
  • Revert "Re-enable eventsourceerror for Unix/CoreCLR" #104131
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Added SVE APIs `CreateMaskForFirstActiveElement` and `CreateMaskForNextActiveElement` #104002
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    NO-MERGE, breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix #103485 #103935
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use the same method to generate DllImportAttribute in local methods and P/Invoke forwarders #103973
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Print linking instructions for NativeLib=static #103960
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ConvertToint64` and `ConvertToUInt64` #104069
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add SVE registers to pal context #103801
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2484755 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Shoring up XmlSerializer/Schema tests #101621
    area-Serialization
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #103937
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [nomerge] [GC] Add verification and logging to region_free_list #104061
    area-GC-coreclr
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, avx512
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Optimize "(vec & cns) == zero" on arm64 #102705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [DRAFT] More TypeName APIs #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization
  • Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104111
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Convert Array.IsSimpleCopy and CanAssignArray type to managed #104103
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [coreclr] Remove CatchHardwareExceptionHolder #104121
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [NRBF] Reject orphaned records and invalid references #103632
    binary-serialization, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0

    area-System.Net, os-linux, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 - Added SVE APIs `ExtractLastVector`, `ExtractLastScalar`, `ExtractAfterLastVector`, `ExtractAfterLastScalar` #103847
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Detect and warn when users consume OutputPath in Project files directly #41852
  • dotnet tool restore results in FileNotFoundException on linux due to case sensitivity issue #41844

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41841
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Allow runtime binary into the VMR #41839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Upgrade rather than install, in case .NET is on container/machine alr… #41857
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • feat: Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #40416
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Upgrade rather than install, in case .NET is on container/machine alr… #41855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add xunit configuration to increase test logging #41829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Minimize container dependency redistribution #41740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Avoid redistributing MSBuild.dll #41739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Plan for addressing torn SDK builds #41790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41716
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Object initializer updates #8253

Merged

  • Update first-class Span speclet with LDM decisions #8241

Updated

  • Extract open issues and organize Expressions section #8209

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support limiting CS1591 to certain members #74209
  • IDE0304 should preserve the leading comment #74208
    Backlog
  • Roslyn wrote incorrect timedatestime to PE Coff Header of a .Net 8.0 program file #74200

Closed

  • Error when applying IDE0079 in problems tab #73272
    17.11 P3
  • Builds not reporting source-build prebuilts as errors #69846
  • Please expose an API for detecting assembly-agnostic attributes and modifier types #52119
  • Generate Constructor Quick Action doesn't work on Primary Constructors #73581
    17.11
  • TupleTypeDecoder does not handle pointer types #43857
  • Exclude System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions from source-build #36038
  • Remove prebuilts from source-build #36030
  • EndToEndTests.LongInitializers often times out on linux #69210
    17.11
  • Expose `SeparatedSyntaxList<T>.GetWithSeparators()` through interface #73575
    17.12
  • ProjectChanged Events Triggered More Often #74058
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35027.32 #74197
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35027.161 #74196
  • Outlining no longer obeys preferences #73984

PullRequests

Created

  • MetadataAsSource options #74212
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74211
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Work around MSBuild task ordering bug #74205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge 'main' into features/FirstClassSpan #74203
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't reference netstandard1.x packages #74199
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Test PR 73873 #74198
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add fallback options to solution snapshot #74038
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update insertion config #74202
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • EnumerableConditionalWeakTable and WeakEvent #74160
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • On-the-fly-docs update naming #74173
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix scenario where lightbulbs weren't being displayed #74191
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge CI fix #74181 into `roles` branch #74204
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Better detect equivalence in our strong name provider #74151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2484362 #74192
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74129
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Cherry pick #74034 #74174
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consume new Razor EA #74134
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74195
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Display lifted primary constructor parameters in watch window … #74188
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Ide options #74053
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks - 1 of n #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make project system workspace transformation functions resilient to being attempted twice #74189
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to move people over to System.Threading.Lock #74170
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add WorkspaceKinds flags enum #74171
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename the record parameter when its property get renamed #74168
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Address PR feedback on https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/74132 #74193
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add tests for consuming instance extension methods from VB and previous version of C# compiler. #74182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Do not store temp of ref conditional operator by value #74116
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.12
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • New generator apis #74127
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor catch-all route enhancement #56518
  • Quarantine StreamPool_ManyConcurrentStreams_StreamPoolFull #56517
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #56515
  • Editor quick help link goes to generic landing page for error rather than the page for the error (Code analysis) #56514
  • Problem With some extensions like tronlink #56512
  • Problem registering GET routing handler after using routing groups and adding a filter #56511
  • Add PageModel SignIn and Signout methods to ComponentBase for OIDC #56510
  • Razor Streamrendering not working for the example weather app #56509
  • RemoteAuthenticatorView is failing when CustomAuthenticationStateProvider is registered for keycloak #56508
  • Cannot do request filtering on invalid requests as blazor expects to use the fallback #56507
  • HubException when using MessagePack in .NET 8 #56502

Closed

  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #56492
  • Blazor binding not working properly with inheritance and computed properties (?) #56417
  • Multiple Browser Tabs, Keeping Authentication State in Sync #56473
  • Blazor Server - InvokeAsync(StateHasChanged) does not work correctly with UI streaming. #56474
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #56493
  • Baggage not extracted without trace id from the request #50158
  • Dereference the result of createJSObjectReference from JavaScript #56200

PullRequests

Created

  • Always ref request body and response schemas and fix nested types #56513
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Increase the default number of IO queues on larger machines #56501
    area-networking, 9.0.0
  • Annotate histograms with bucket boundaries #56500
    area-networking

Merged

  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview7
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Set OpenAPI discriminators for JSON polymorphic types #56466
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Remove IIS launch profiles from templates #56489
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview7
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as FrozenDictionary instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Set readOnly status for properties and support OpenApiServers #56470
    area-mvc
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException Throw methods in SendFileResponseExtensions..CheckRange #56420
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10 #56275
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IOS build failed with "You may also need to include 'iossimulator-x64' in your project's RuntimeIdentifiers" #23352
  • .Net MAUI Binidng inside Collectinview Inside Datatemplate Inside ResourceDictionary #23350
  • FontImage markup extension doesn't allow AppThemeBinding #23347
  • Image IsVisible Binding does not work when Shadow applied #23344
  • [Android] Crash when running release mode #23342
  • Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #23333
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I4_ Selection - Click the 'Single pre-selection for Vertical list ' item will throw an exception: Object reference not set to an instance of an object #23332
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I5_EmptyView - The data template selector cannot display the correct string. #23330
    Backlog

Closed

  • Spurious 'Must declare Runtime Identifier triggered' when linking to platform dependent libraries #15436
  • Valid CSS not parsed correctly, breaks app #18056
  • Suspending an iOS app while debugging will lock up the app #23340
  • CodesignEntitlements doesn't seem to work in project #23045
  • Cannot use Shared Project with MAUI #23260
  • [MAUI]I5-EmptyView- filter not responding. #23301
  • [MAUI] I4_ Selection - The default items not highlight in Single Pre-selection and Multiple Pre-selection Page #23299
  • [MAUI] I2_Spacing - Changing the vertical and horizontal spacing values, images and location are truncated #23310
  • [MAUI] I1_Layout - Horoizontal grid for DataTemplate & Horoizontal grid for Text pages display only three-rows grid. #23303
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout-The window height on MacCatalyst must be adjusted to the maximum to scroll horizontally #23306
  • Debugging MAUI gives "Could not found a valid Xcode app bundle at..." #23326
  • Poor performance in debug mode under iOS and Android #12508
  • IOS: PDF Readers are not shown in open in menu #23083

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • [DO-NOT-MERGE] Update to newer android/emsdk dependencies for net9p6 #23353
    do-not-merge
  • Bump Appium Drivers #23349
  • [Windows] `LabelHandler` - remove extra (?) line #23346
    community ✨
  • Simplify `NavigationRootManager.Connect` on the Windows platform. #23345
    community ✨
  • Navigationbar BarBackgroundColor is not updating - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar
  • Export logs before device is deleted #23334
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Obsolete Frame for NET9 in favor of Border #23184
    t/docs 📝, area-controls-frame
  • Bump Appium version to 2.11 #23337
    area-infrastructure, area-testing
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Bump Appium version to 2.11 #23339
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Bump Appium version to 2.11 #23338
    area-testing
  • [tests] test a lot more things in `MemoryTests.cs` #23324
    memory-leak 💦, testing-missing-tests
  • Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2151.40` to `1.0.2592.51` #23209
    area-blazor, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Null terminate iOS TabbedRenderer #23335

Updated

  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23328
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove duplicated CarV/ColV galleries #23190
    area-infrastructure
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `TabbedPage` #23281
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, memory-leak 💦
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `MauiWinUIWindow` #23327
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area-drawing, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Fix select-all Entry select logic #23329
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-entry
  • Don't let Glide clear the old image on Android ImageView unless we get an error #23313
    community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Windows] Make sure that `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` folder exists in unpackaged #23265
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Add an API for creating instances of TypedBinding #23239
    area-xaml, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Programmatically creating FormattedString Spans with GestureRecognizers causes duplicate Command runs #23238
    community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Android] fix TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped called multiple times on Android #23183
    community ✨, area-gestures
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items - fix #23221
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Support the new RIDs on WinUI #23247
    area-infrastructure
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • Generate the Android 7 round app icon #23276
    area-single-project

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve performance for RelationalCommandCache by adding a hashcode to the Command #34117
  • Cosmos: Optional One-To-Many relationship failing to explicit load (and improperly setting properties to null) #34112
  • AOT: query precompilation can be extemely slow for some query shapes (specifically containing JSON) #34108
  • Stuck on inherited entity model binding #34107

Closed

  • New EFCore Provider Translate Date addition/subtraction #34104
  • EF Core Migration Issue: Column Already Exists #34101

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for #34117, Improve Hash Code Distribution for RelationalCommandCache Keys #34118
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version to 4.10 #34116
  • Lock the database while executing Migrate() #34115
  • Translation of TimeOnly.FromTimeSpan on SQL Server no-op #34114
  • Enable JSON tests on SQLite #34113
  • Enable testing of compiled models in CI and on SQLite #34111
  • Improved nested SelectMany with DefaultIfEmpty #34110

Merged

  • Use XOR to translate some NOT expressions #34080
    breaking-change
  • Update getting-and-building-the-code.md #34100

Updated

  • Don't use service discovery for DbContext types if corresponding IDesignTimeDbContextFactory implementations are found. #34082
  • Implement Cosmos pagination #34103
